item.description:
This is our regular monthly family game night and it is open to everyone.

Truly a "game night" we have Star Wars Miniatures, chess, Trivial Pursuit and maybe a PS3 for Guitar Hero band play (if anone wants to bring instruments let me know! I have a microphone and guitar)

Bring your favorite board game and have an enjoyable night out. Some of the games I can bring include Ticket to Ride, Robo Rally, Scene It, TP, and Boggle.

Last month Eric taught us how to play the game House on Haunted Hill which was a blast. This month we are going to try a game Doug was sent (the name escapes me) as well as whatever else anyone brings.
item.name: Doric Game Night
